scripts.db:migrate:prod: wrangler d1 migrations apply aikougi-production --remote --env production
scripts.db:seed:local: wrangler d1 execute aikougi-development --local --file=./seed_clean.sql && wrangler d1 execute aikougi-development --local --file=./seed_users.sql
scripts.db:seed:dev: wrangler d1 execute aikougi-development --remote --file=./seed_clean.sql && wrangler d1 execute aikougi-development --remote --file=./seed_users.sql
scripts.db:reset:local: rm -rf .wrangler/state/v3/d1 && npm run db:migrate:local && npm run db:seed:local
scripts.deploy:dev: npm run build && wrangler pages deploy dist --project-name aikougi --branch dev
scripts.deploy:prod:force: npm run backup:prod && npm run db:migrate:prod && npm run build && wrangler pages deploy dist --project-name aikougi --branch main
